professional_summary: Experienced SQL Database Administrator II with expertise in optimizing database performance, managing high-availability environments, and executing complex migrations, backups, and restorations across multiple locations including Fort Lauderdale, FL; Hollywood, FL; and San Juan, PR. Proficient in SQL Server administration, SSRS, SSIS, Hyperion Performance Suite, and various other tools and software.

key_responsibilities: Optimizing and enhancing database performance in high-availability environments.
Executing complex database migrations and backups to ensure data integrity and availability.
Providing technical support for database-related tasks and projects.
Assisting with database optimization and maintenance.
Supporting database migrations and backup processes.
Contributing to the overall database health and performance.
Managing and optimizing SQL Server databases to ensure high performance.
Overseeing database migrations and backup strategies.
Providing technical support for database-related tasks.
Administering SQL Server databases and ensuring optimal performance.
Managing database migrations and backup processes.
Contributing to the overall database health and performance.
